resources.string:
Whatâ€™s your name? - My name is Apple Kimberly M. Calvario 

Tell me something about you. - I am 21 years old, and an irregular student, I shift course from BEED to BSIT because I don	 see myself being a teacher in the future. It was my mother\s dream for me but I chose to follow the path of my own. I believe there will be a time where I have to decide for myself, and I didn	 regret doing it. 

Tell me about your strengths. - I don	 give up easily, which makes me a strong person cause no matter what obstacle I face, i always try to find a way to face it. I can also be a risk taker, I am not afraid to try new things and gain experiences that will be beneficial for me in the future. 












Tell me what inspires you. - Successful people who don't look aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaadown on others and instead help them grow always inspires me. Also my family and people who support me. Now that I am working as a student assistant, the people i encounter at work also motivates and inspires me to do my best everyday.
